entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 07:38 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:38 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
